item.title: MIUI OS2.0.202.0.VNOCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G China

Codename: zircon

Version: OS2.0.202.0.VNOCNXM | 15.0

Size: 8.3 GB

MD5: 8b804a6162f9254cff3f2e1c9f7a6913

Changelog:
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
Optimization: Interrupt animation during app transitions
Optimization: Interrupt animation when closing apps in Landscape mode
[System]
New: Home screen wallpaper now supports a blur effect
Optimization: Immersive effect for full screen indicator in certain scenarios
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Optimization: Animation effects when launching apps
Optimization: Scrolling performance on content feeds in some third party apps
Optimization: In certain screens, larger text sizes are now supported
Optimization: Stability of animations when opening and closing apps
Fix: Gestures didn't work properly in certain scenarios
Fix: Issues with animations when opening or closing apps
Fix: Wallpapers disappeared in rare cases when opening or closing apps
Fix: Occasional display glitches when opening or closing apps
[Home screen]
New: Home screen icon text now displays shadows over light wallpaper areas for better readability
[Basic experience]
Optimization: Tweaked the Storage refresh algorithm so it activates more often
[App vault]
New: Travel assistant now supports adding trips manually
[Lock screen]
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock now supports new animations
[Camera]
All-new design
Brand-new visual language: A more professional visual style provides a deeper sense of immersion while shooting.
· Structure optimization: We streamlined the feature menus and optimized the settings page.
Pro mode upgrade: Adjusted the interface layout and combined parameter options to reduce preview obstruction and help you focus on your creative process.
Enhanced watermark features:
· Added a check-in watermark.
· Film frame watermark now supports black or white backgrounds
· The standard watermark supports custom positioning.
Expanded personalization settings: Added support for multiple camera interface color schemes.
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Some status bar icons now support custom display
Optimization: Custom notifications now support unfolding
Optimization: HD signal icon no longer permanently shown in the status bar
[Accessibility]
Fix: Touch gestures stopped working in TalkBack mode
Fix: Volume buttons didn't work in TalkBack mode
Fix: Issues that prevented Recorder from capturing TalkBack audio
Fix: Issues with announcements for unselected items in Calendar and other apps
Fix: Some buttons weren't announced in several apps, including Settings, Control center, Messaging, Contacts, Weather, Notes, and Browser
More accessibility fixes are available in Xiaomi Community

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.202.0.VNOCNXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G China

Version: OS2.0.202.0.VNOCNXM | 15.0

Size: 6.7 GB

MD5: bbf917626eeaf55de4a6754e5e596597

Changelog:
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
Optimization: Interrupt animation during app transitions
Optimization: Interrupt animation when closing apps in Landscape mode
[System]
New: Home screen wallpaper now supports a blur effect
Optimization: Immersive effect for full screen indicator in certain scenarios
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Optimization: Animation effects when launching apps
Optimization: Scrolling performance on content feeds in some third party apps
Optimization: In certain screens, larger text sizes are now supported

Fix: Issues with animations when opening or closing apps
Fix: Wallpapers disappeared in rare cases when opening or closing apps
Fix: Occasional display glitches when opening or closing apps
[Home screen]
New: Home screen icon text now displays shadows over light wallpaper areas for better readability
[Basic experience]
Optimization: Tweaked the Storage refresh algorithm so it activates more often
[App vault]
New: Travel assistant now supports adding trips manually
[Lock screen]
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock now supports new animations
[Camera]
All-new design
Brand-new visual language: A more professional visual style provides a deeper sense of immersion while shooting.
· Structure optimization: We streamlined the feature menus and optimized the settings page.
Pro mode upgrade: Adjusted the interface layout and combined parameter options to reduce preview obstruction and help you focus on your creative process.
Enhanced watermark features:
· Added a check-in watermark.
· Film frame watermark now supports black or white backgrounds
· The standard watermark supports custom positioning.
Expanded personalization settings: Added support for multiple camera interface color schemes.
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Some status bar icons now support custom display
Optimization: Custom notifications now support unfolding
Optimization: HD signal icon no longer permanently shown in the status bar
[Accessibility]
Fix: Touch gestures stopped working in TalkBack mode
Fix: Volume buttons didn't work in TalkBack mode
Fix: Issues that prevented Recorder from capturing TalkBack audio
Fix: Issues with announcements for unselected items in Calendar and other apps
Fix: Some buttons weren't announced in several apps, including Settings, Control center, Messaging, Contacts, Weather, Notes, and Browser
More accessibility fixes are available in Xiaomi Community

Download: Here
